How to Scan Your Temperature

 1. Hold The device 2-5 cm away from your forehead.
 2. Stay still for a second while the sensor takes a reading.
 3. Your temperature will appear on the screen.

 ⚠️ Note: This app provides an approximate temperature measurement. It is not a medical device and should not be used for medical diagnosis or treatment. For accurate health assessments, please consult a healthcare professional.
 You can change the temperature between °C and °F with the button in the upper right corner.
